definition: to have spare time/free from work/it's not important/it's nothing/never mind
erhua variant of 哥們|哥们[ge1 men5]
to make sb change their ways, opinions etc
certainly/also written 一準|一准[yi1 zhun3]
to avoid/so as to save (money or time)
don't get involved/ignore it!/don't have anything to do with (him, her etc)/don't speak to
